roleset.name: threaten, put into danger
roleset.note: JEOPARDIZE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with threaten. No VN class. Framenet class endangering. Updated 12/10 by Katie. (from jeopardize.01-v)

example.name: normal usage
example.text: [The Conservatives-1] don't dare *trace*-1 jeopardize marginal Tory seats inCoventry, where Jaguar has headquarters...
example.arg: marginal Tory seats in Coventry , where Jaguar has headquarters
